title: Kimi no Yume wo Miteiru
sinopse:
We have Amemori, who claims that he has always been having psychic dreams about Yui falling in love with him. And then we have Yui, who kisses him on the exact day that was in the dream. So is their love some psychic fate?!

(Source: Hoshikuzuu Scans & Rooftop Love BL)
